events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred at the intersection near Pine Street at approximately 8 AM.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the report regarding the vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned promptly to this vehicle accident claim to ensure timely handling and support for the customer.
The claim has been acknowledged and confirmation sent to the policyholder outlining the next steps in the process.
We requested a copy of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the driver’s license to proceed with the investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report, vehicle photos, and the insurance card.
Our claims team began the investigation focusing on verifying event details and assessing liability for the auto accident.
After a thorough review, the investigation was completed confirming no contributory negligence from the insured.
A settlement proposal was sent to the policyholder offering compensation for the vehicle repairs based on estimates received.
The customer responded positively confirming agreement with the proposed settlement offer and appreciation for clear communication.
Following customer approval, the claim was officially approved for payment processing to cover the damages.
Payment for the repair costs was disbursed to the insured’s designated bank account without delays.
The claim was formally closed after full settlement, and a thank-you message was sent to the policyholder for their cooperation.
All documentation related to the vehicle accident claim has been archived securely as part of record retention policy.
